normal.title: Normal Thyroid
normal.description: A normal thyroid gland shows homogeneous echotexture with smooth margins and normal vascularity on ultrasound.
normal.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only.

benign.title: Benign Thyroid Nodule
benign.description: Benign thyroid nodules are non-cancerous growths commonly found in the thyroid gland. They are usually slow-growing and often asymptomatic.
benign.disclaimer: AI-assisted result. Not a medical diagnosis.

malignant.title: Malignant Thyroid Nodule
malignant.description: Malignant thyroid nodules are cancerous growths that may show aggressive features on ultrasound imaging.
clinical_significance: Fine Needle Aspiration (FNA) may be advised
malignant.disclaimer: This is an AI-based prediction and must be confirmed by a qualified medical professional.

normal.title: Normal Liver
normal.description: A normal liver shows homogeneous echotexture and smooth surface with clear visualization of blood vessels.

fatty_liver.title: Fatty Liver Disease
fatty_liver.description: Fatty liver disease occurs when excess fat accumulates in liver cells, leading to increased liver echogenicity on ultrasound.
fatty_liver.disclaimer: This is an AI-assisted interpretation, not a clinical diagnosis.

cirrhosis.title: Liver Cirrhosis
cirrhosis.description: Cirrhosis is a chronic liver condition characterized by fibrosis and nodular liver surface.
ultrasound_features: Reduced liver size in advanced stages
cirrhosis.disclaimer: Further clinical tests are required for confirmation.
